content: This is the topic for discussing questions and considerations for profiles in the Medications Sub Stream (Immunization, Medication, MedicationRequest, MedicationStatement)

The Medications Sub Stream will meet on Mondays from 12-1pm EST starting on November 25th.

You can find call-in information on the Infoway Events Calendar as well as below:
